captions.text: Happiness,joyous

sad,distress
anger,rage
helpless,feckless
these are the common emotions that every human will possess
he can express them in any way
what if those emotions have a body?
what if they can talk?
hello! yah yah tell me
the emotion that lies in this camera is helplessness
he's always helpless
when did it happen?
the emotion that lies in this tripod is feckless
he is the operator for this camera
hey sadness! come fast
again he will come back
where the hell are you? i can't see you
hey not there
the person who is coming right now is Sadness
he is the most common feeling that every human possess
these three emotions will always stay together
over here
set the focus
set the focus
are you ready?
yah ready!
in this world every individual will be sad for one or the other reason
in fact to be honest i am also sad
because i am missing my friend
Happy!
without him i am left with
this camera(helplessness)
and that tripod(feckless)
hey! hey! hey! please stop
hey sadness look there in this world a person who possess money happiness lies with them only
shit! how did we miss such a small logic
hello sir! you should only save him
don't worry i'll take care of him
that's true! to be happy one has to be alive
dude Sid committed suicide
i don't want to live without you
it is such a twist
we thought happiness lies within one's life
where the hell is "Happy" ?
me(sadness), camera(helplessness), tripod(feckless)
were traveling in this car, where ever this car travelled
we were in search, for our friend happy
we went to many places
day and night we were searching but we found him no where
first we thought happiness lies in money but no
at least we thought he's(happiness) in life but
one person directly committed suicide
on the way we found few people laughing, at least we thought happiness lies within their smile but
we found selfishness hiding behind every smile
one fine day while we were searching
a thief came and took away camera(helplessness) and tripod(feckless)
i decided not to leave them
because  without them i won't exist
that's true!
thief sold us for 5000rs
ten days we were in that shop
but according to the fate
a person relieved us from that shop
from there the journey began in his car
first time i left camera and tripod in that car
and went searching for happy in that restaurant
no one will be happy if they are in love,it says give give but in return you will get nothing
dude! look at his face
we are discussing something important here and he's in a different world
what should i do? shall i cry?
tell him if you are in love you won't be happy
Happy?
i think someone is talking about happy
actually when you were in love with meera were you happy?
if you think you are happy you will be, if not you wont
if you love somebody will we be happy or not?
happy!
its been two years since i heard the word happy
its been a decade here tell me where the hell is happy
i think 25th or 26th
its 28th of august
yah yah  its 28th it was saturday
that day i found my happiness in a temple
what if she rejects
whatever it is i'll face it
ok i love you too
i don't know it was so magical
it seemed to me like the whole world was in love with each other
i couldn't express how happy i am within myself
i thought nobody has any problems in this world
that polluted air also seemed like fog in a hill station
those kids and their happiness
i can find happiness every where
no words to express how happy i am
i said to myself that i am happy
dude you don't know ,since two years i was following her actually
meera is a rule book, hmmm
she's a manual,she's more like a set of sequences i don't know what it is called?
algorithm
you guys said that you din't prepare for the exams but it looks like you've prepared well
why the F*** will you disturb him while he's saying something about happy
the next big question is,
i dint know what to do
the problem is that meera used to scold me ever since i started talking to her so i dint know how to start the conversation
did your neighbor invite you for lunch?
no!
or did your ex-girlfriend appeared before you after a longtime?
no!
then why?
why do you hesitate!
previously she belonged to her father P.V subba rao
but today
she's mine! she's mine!
common you can do it
be a man!
what? what happened
nothing nothing
ok what ever
at what time do you wake usually
12 o clock
that is afternoon i was asking about morning
from tomorrow all those things wont work
early to bed!
early to rise!
did u get it!
go to bed by sharp 10pm in the night, i'll wake you up by 6am in the morning
oh god! i'll manage something in the morning
the phone rang exactly at 6am in the morning
first time she called
ok fine
she could have woke me up normally
instead of that she used a weapon
weapon? what weapon?
let me sleep meera please
ok fine bye!
we have to request them ,we are always in a hurry to talk to them
that is where we get suppressed,oh god! such a dangerous weapon
ok ok i'll wake up
suddenly our first semister exams started
done with the exams
meera dint get used to me
but there is a bit of  gap between us
whenever i call her she use to cut the phone
to fulfill the crisis im facing
a guy called ajay entered into my life
ajay? who is ajay?
ajay is a fake account i created in way-to-sms
in 10months of our relationship i got to know that meera is scared of ghosts
hello
my name is ajay!
i usually go to shantaram internet cafe
unfortunately one day the cafe got burned due to a short circuit  that occured
in that mishap the whole cafe was burned down to ashes
many people died
i was one among them
u doubt wether i am dead or alive?
don't get confused
i am DEAD!
if you tell about this to anyone
then your head will be blasted into 1000 pieces
hahahahah!!!!
with that reason i started talking to her daily
this time i woke up myself and was waiting for her call
her rules and regulations were my daily routine now
suddenly one day she called
hello
im scared
like a hero i said "don't worry im there"
you stay miles away from my house, how do you expect to save me from those ghosts
bloody! even though she is scared ,she makes fun of me
like superhero i said i'll fly and come for you
that is where i landed into trouble
that was a well said dialogue, then what happened
after 2years
for the first time i was late
it was not my mistake but someone else
hyderabad traffic
that day you told you will fly and come, then what happened?
at night's in some tempo and in that flow i told i'll fly and come
but common dude how can we fly?
this is fine
what about that memory power she has
god she remembered things which i told her 2years ago
such a bizarre!
this torture dint end here
im sick
im tired
i need some rest
finally one day we argued,shit it was network problem
why did you cut the phone
i said i dint
no u did it
god i dint do it
now don't give me reasons
ok fine i did it so what ?
go to hell
well i am already in hell
ok fine
i had a sound sleep that night,but
vijay wake up you idiot its 6am
later i got to know that habit is such a big addiction
i don't even like green tea,why the hell i am drinking it
im missing meera whenever i see those horns
even those steps remind me of meera
where ever i see its meera! meera! meera!
shit

i used to talk to her sitting at every corner of my house,
every in my house reminds me of her
i cant even go out peacefully because there is no such place that meera and i not been to
this is fine
night time in that silence sitting all alone i'll be watching the roof top in the room,i don't know what thoughts will be running in my mind
to be honest and to speak frankly
i am missing her torture like hell
torture torture torture
what if such a busy life is all empty now?
i am missing that life
there is a village called sirisilla, i think you people know
when those people weave clothes that process makes some kind of sound
without which they can't even go to sleep, my situation is similar to that
without all those rules and regulations i cant even sleep properly
but she doesn't mind in updating her activities through facebook
there is an idiot called sanjay
charcoal face******
he likes her photos and every now and then
bloody he looks like a scarecrow on the facebook timeline
he might be a friend of her, what will you do about that
i did
why shouldn't i do?
even i uploaded a picture and called girls form my friends and asked them to like my picture
bloody she dint even give a care about it
i think im only reacting unnecessarily
basically im missing something
not her ,im missing myself
anyways she's leaving tomorrow  6 o clock flight,
to delhi
i think there is still 4 hours left for the flight
damn why did even break-up for a silly network issue
if i go to her house she will slap me so not recommended
hi this is ajay
i don't know if your head will blast into pieces if you tell about the ghost message to anyone but vijay's head will blast for sure if you leave to delhi
so please spare him because ajay is none other than me
idiot
everyone found happiness
but i dint find him yet
who the hell are you?
"I AM HAPPY"
happiness doesn't lie within materialistic objects it lies within ourselves
when you feel happiness within then the world looks great and everything seems fine
when your frustrated the same world looks like hell
so if u think you are happy
you will be HAPPY

title: I am Happy || Telugu latest Comedy Short Film 2014 || Presented By Runway Reel
